edu.eur.absa.data

Class SemEval2015Task12ABSAReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.eur.absa.data.SemEval2015Task12ABSAReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataReader

    public class SemEval2015Task12ABSAReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataReader
    A reader for the SemEval2015 Task 12 ABSA data sets, works also for the SemEval2016 Task 5 ABSA Subtask 1 data (same format). This is a good example of an XML reader. Data for this reader can be found at: - http://alt.qcri.org/semeval2015/task12/index.php?id=data-and-tools - http://alt.qcri.org/semeval2016/task5/index.php?id=important-dates (subtask 1 only)
    Author:
    Kim Schouten
